data.actual_result: Unread message bar is cleared, marking all messages as read
data.expected_result: Unread messages gets 1 more added to it, and bar remains there
data.short_description: Receiving messages while you have the blue new message bar clears the new message bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with multiple unread messages (easily reproducible with 50+) - Receive a new message in the channel while there are still unread messages
